price: Kuma Ubangijinka ne Mafi sani game da wanda yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa. Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun fĩfĩta sãshen Annabãwa a kan sãshe kuma Mun bai wa Dãwũda zabũra.*
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا
footnotes: * Muƙãrana a tsakãnin Annabãwa. Allah Yã fĩfĩta waɗansu a kan waɗansu. Falalar Dãwũda a kan waɗansu Annabãwa da Zabũra ne to inã fĩfĩkon wanda aka bai wa Alƙur'ãni mafĩfĩcin littafi da sauran Annabãwa?.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka aʿlamu biman fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walaqad faḍḍalnā baʿḍa al-nabiyīna ʿalā baʿḍin waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
